Title: Excess Animus
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Dre Ryan
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, DJ Qualls, Joel de la Fuente
Plot: Juliana embarks on a mission to stop the Nazis - a mission that reunites her with old friends. Thelma and Nicole grow closer, despite the risks. Smith learns more about the Nazis' efforts ...
